item.title: Large accumulation of potholes across the road, 27th January
item.description:
Multiple potholes across the carriage way as you enter the dual carriageway, this is causing traffic to violently have to move around the potholes. this area needs to be repaired before it causes a high speed crash
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Shipton, Cotswold

item.title: Drain has been replaced, 27th January

BUT‚Ä¶.. it‚Äôs now higher than the original drain so the rainwater bypasses the drain and adds to the flooding on to my property and/or the next drain having to take too much rain water (I believe this drain is blocked too reference reporting number 8781917

item.title: Drain blocked and water flooding on to property, 27th January
item.description:
Ivy cottage Dog Lane As I look off my drive it‚Äôs on left hand side, as you look at the property it‚Äôs to the right hand side of the driveway I believe the outlet pipe is fully blocked with Silt! It‚Äôs Been like that for a good while, but the drain has never failed to take the rainwater before (unless covered in leaves, üçÅ it is currently clear of leaves If I didn‚Äôt divert the water away from the property there‚Äôs a very high chance it will cause flooding to my house.

item.title: By the bus stop and barrier to the footpath, 27th January
item.description:
This is another terrible gash along Swindon Lane. The whole surface should be stripped and relaid rather than keep coming out - often to redo when a reparied hole comes out again. This one is By the bus stop and barrier to the footpath
